mapper.select: SELECT a.* ,count(b.codeGroup_seq) as codeNum FROM codeGroup a inner join code b on b.codeGroup_seq=a.seq WHERE 1=1 AND codeGroupNameKor LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') OR codeGroupNameEng LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') OR codeGroupCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') group by b.codeGroup_seq
